General.Name: Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Science & Technology Co Ltd
General.Description: Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Science & TechnologyCo.,Ltd. operates in the environmental protection industry in China and internationally. The company undertakes EPC projects, such as semi-dry and wet limestone-gypsum desulfurization, and NOx removal technology; offers FGD products, including TSP-I composite FGD spray lines, mist eliminator, single-shaft double louver series doors, TBF-DU belt type vacuum filter, rubber lined pipes, and MST series desulfurization ball mills; denitration products; dedusting products, which include electric bag composite dust collectors, wet electro-static precipitators, and dry dust removers. It also offers wastewater reduction and recovery technology, flue gas heat exchange products, non-electrical field flue gas management, solid waste treatment technology, ocean TUNA, and denitration catalysts. In addition, the company provides EPC engineering and general contracting services. Zhejiang Tuna Environmental Science & TechnologyCo.,Ltd. was founded in 2005 and is headquartered in Shaoxing, China.
